thread.title: We Need To Talk About How Fucking Gross Seafood Is
thread.title_full: We Need To Talk About How Fucking Gross Seafood Is

author: Samantha Wieder
title: We Need To Talk About How Fucking Gross Seafood Is
text:
View this image ›
Twitter: @xkhaizurah You see that? That’s seafood and some people actually enjoy consuming it. So, let’s just talk about the repulsiveness that is this gunk for a few minutes.
ID: 10563463 2. Let’s start with what is single-handedly the WORST of the worst: oysters. This is NOT food. This is NOT meant for human intake. They are “shucking” terrible. View this image ›
Twitter: @MaddisonLynn ID: 10563484 3. In fact, all shellfish is vile. Don’t eat it. You deserve better. Twitter: @AnaelleLemasson
Twitter: @AndyOsira
 ID: 10593925 4. This includes lobsters. View this image ›
Twitter: @SuperVillainMe Seriously, what the actual fuck?
ID: 10563524 5. If you are dating someone whose idea of a romantic night out is putting on some bibs and eating this shit, you need to get out of that toxic relationship, and get out fast. View this image ›
Twitter: @zaynxcx ID: 10563595 6. Then, there are some things that should be illegal to cook and eat. Excuse me, it looks like it wants to strangle anyone that comes remotely close to it with all eight tentacles. Thesp4n1sh / Getty Images, Cinoby / Getty Images ID: 10591202 7. What is this? View this image ›
Twitter: @devontooturnt ID: 10591230 8. Why View this image ›
Twitter: @coasterfreek ID: 10591676 9. And while we are on the subject of sushi, SUSHI IS ANOTHER NO-NO. Seriously, cooked seafood is bad enough, but raw seafood? I have a very hard time believing that our bodies were made to process the consumption of literal slime. View this image ›
Twitter: @Richmond_Lee ID: 10578332 10. Also, don’t even get me started on this canned cat food aka tuna. View this image ›
Twitter: @yvonne_nolan ID: 10583847 11. I don’t care if it’s quick and easy. It does not look, smell, or taste appetizing. View this image ›
Rightone / Getty Images ID: 10563608 12. What about salmon? I know it’s supposed to be “healthy,” but this looks like an actual chunk of a human brain. View this image ›
Twitter: @bySamRo Also, salmon pink is an awful color.
ID: 10579159 13. And lox is salmon’s ugly sister whose only job is to ruin a perfectly good bagel. View this image ›
Twitter: @jaminman ID: 10579174 14. But the best is when seafood-lovers try to rope in seafood-haters with calamari as if that’s the gateway drug to enjoying seafood. News flash: CALAMARI IS DISGUSTING, TOO. View this image ›
Twitter: @Jack4409 ID: 10563881 15. And, don’t even try to pretend that non-fried calamari tastes like pasta because it does not. Pasta is a gift from the gods and calamari is a gift from Satan. View this image ›
@isntajerk / Via instagram.com Do NOT ruin my love for tortellini by trying to trick me into eating these nauseating ringlets.
ID: 10563901 16. And, finally on that note, do not EVER be the type of person who tries to sneakily make a seafood-hater eat seafood. View this image ›
GQ / Via video.gq.com Eating fish sticks that were not chicken fingers is the reason I have lifelong trust issues.
ID: 10563931 So, do you agree that seafood is the worst? We Need To Talk About How Fucking Gross Seafood Is Oops, something went wrong! Looks like we are having a problem on the server.
